hymn.title: Trust in the Lord with all your heart

layout.singingstanza: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, Lean not to your own un -- der -- stand -- ing. In all your ways ac -- knowl -- edge Him, And He shall di -- rect your paths.

lyrics.stanza: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, Lean not to your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge Him, And He shall direct your paths.
